    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Returns:
      true if the shelf is full of card, false otherwise

    • asMatrix

      public Card[][] asMatrix()
      Returns:
      a matrix of cards that represent the shelf

    • checkCell

      public Card checkCell(PlanarCoordinate planarCoordinate) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Checks a cell in the shelf
      Parameters:
      planarCoordinate - is at the coordinate that you want to check
      Returns:
      the card that is in the selected cell, null if there is none
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - on invalid coordinates

    • canInsert

      public boolean canInsert(List<Card> cardList, int column)
      Check if you can insert the cards in the column selected
      Parameters:
      cardList - is the list of cards that you had withdraw
      column - is the column selected to insert the cards of the list
      Returns:
      true if you can do the selected action, false otherwise

    • insert

      public void insert(List<Card> cardList, int column)
      Inserts the card in the selected column (is best to check with canInsert)
      Parameters:
      cardList - is a list of card that you are going to insert
      column - is the column selected to insert the card

    • maxFreeSpace

      public int maxFreeSpace()
      Returns:
      the max vertical space available in all the columns of the shelf

    • getAdjacentGroupsSizes

      public List<Integer> getAdjacentGroupsSizes()
      Returns:
      sizes of the groups of adjacent cards (of the same type) in the shelf

    • getGroupSize

      public int getGroupSize(Card[][] shelfMatrix, PlanarCoordinate actual, Card.Type actualType)
      Parameters:
      shelfMatrix - is the matrix representation of the shelf
      actual - is the coordinate from where you want to check
      actualType - is the type of the card
      Returns:
      the size of the group
